pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sati karaṇīye senaṁ gantvā atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.5_0: Amhākampi alābhā, amhākampi dulladdhaṁ, ye mayaṁ ājīvassa hetu puttadārassa kāraṇā senāya paṭivasāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.6_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.9_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.12_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.14_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:1.15.1_0: “Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṁ gamanāya, dirattatirattaṁ tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.1.1_0: Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṁ gamanāyāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.1.6_0: catutthe divase atthaṅgate sūriye senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.1_0: Atirekatiratte atirekasaññī senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.2_0: Atirekatiratte vematiko senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.2.3_0: Atirekatiratte ūnakasaññī senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc49:2.3.4_0: dve rattiyo vasitvā tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
